title: Linotype Univers
content:
**[Indicies](http://web.archive.org/web/20130613050332/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indicies) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20130613050332/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : Linotype Univers**

During the 1990s, [Adrian Frutiger](http://web.archive.org/web/20130613050332/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adrian%20Frutiger) worked together with [Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20130613050332/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype) to expand and update his classic [Univers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130613050332/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Univers) family. The result, [Linotype Univers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130613050332/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype%20Univers), includes 63 different weights, each drawn carefully to ensure compatibility with all the others.

[The original Univers type family](http://web.archive.org/web/20130613050332/http:/www.linotype.com/1560/univers-family.html) can be found online [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20130613050332/http:/www.linotype.com/1560/univers-family.html). Linotype Univers can be found on this [overview page](http://web.archive.org/web/20130613050332/http:/www.linotype.com/6-1813-6/linotypeunivers.html).
author: dan_reynolds
